description:
# Automated Test Suite Implementation

Implement comprehensive pytest-based testing framework with unit tests for services, integration tests for API endpoints, and fixture management for database testing. This addresses a critical technical debt item identified in the codebase.

## Rationale
Testing infrastructure is essential for maintaining code quality and enabling confident refactoring. Without tests, changes risk breaking existing functionality. Enterprise IAM competitors like SailPoint require extensive customization (pain-sp-6) - having solid tests ensures WhoDis remains reliable and easy to maintain.

## User Stories
- As a developer, I want to run automated tests so that I can verify changes don't break existing functionality
- As a maintainer, I want test coverage reports so that I can identify untested code paths

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] pytest configured in requirements.txt and working with 'pytest' command
- [ ] Unit tests exist for core services (ldap_service, graph_service, genesys_service)
- [ ] Integration tests exist for search endpoints
- [ ] Test coverage report available (minimum 60% coverage for services)
- [ ] CI-compatible test configuration (can run headless)
- [ ] Database fixtures support test isolation
